Class w3c.thotlib.Document 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.thotlib.Document
public class Document
extends Object
Java Classe associated to a Document.

The Java class is just a wrapper around the actual Document data structure handled in the native code.

DeferredDisplay
Asynchronous display mode, compute immediately but display later.
DisplayImmediately
Normal display mode, immediate update on screen.
document
NoComputedDisplay
Blocked display mode, the rendering is not computed.

Document()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.
Document(int)
Initialize a new Document object for an existing Document existing in the native code data space.

DocNo()
Get the document number of this Document object.
IsModified()
Get the modified status of the document, use with care as one may loose data.
Root()
Gives the root element of the document tree.
SetDisplayMode(int)
Change the standard policy on computing display update on the document.
SetModified(boolean)
Set the modified status of the document, use with care as one may loose data.
SSchema()
Gives the internal SSchema for this document.

document 
 protected int document
DisplayImmediately 
 public static final int DisplayImmediately
Normal display mode, immediate update on screen.

DeferredDisplay 
 public static final int DeferredDisplay
Asynchronous display mode, compute immediately but display later.

NoComputedDisplay 
 public static final int NoComputedDisplay
Blocked display mode, the rendering is not computed.

Document 
 public Document()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.

Document 
 public Document(int doc)
Initialize a new Document object for an existing Document existing in the native code data space.

Parameters:
doc - the actual document number.

Root 
 public Element Root()
Gives the root element of the document tree.

Returns:
the Element object for the root of this document, or null if not found.
SSchema 
 public long SSchema()
Gives the internal SSchema for this document.

Returns:
the SSchema value of this document, or zero if not found.
SetModified 
 public void SetModified(boolean modified)
Set the modified status of the document, use with care as one may loose data.

Parameters:
modified - the new modified boolean value.
IsModified 
 public boolean IsModified()
Get the modified status of the document, use with care as one may loose data.

Returns:
the modified boolean value.
SetDisplayMode 
 public void SetDisplayMode(int mode)
Change the standard policy on computing display update on the document.

Parameters:
mode - : either DisplayImmediately, DeferredDisplay or NoComputedDisplay
DocNo 
 public int DocNo()
Get the document number of this Document object.

Returns:
the document number.
